function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of presymptomatic and paucisymptomatic carriers contributing to disease spread","Impact":"Difficulty in assessing the extent of SARS-CoV-2 circulation in the population and efficiently controlling virus transmission","Mitigation":"Increased clinical and laboratory surveillance to detect carriers and implement control measures","Technologies":"Diagnostic tests, contact tracing, and public health education","People":"General population, healthcare workers, public health officials","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of efficient control of virus transmission in wastewater","Impact":"Inability to measure viral circulation in the population and address potential health risks","Mitigation":"Enhanced wastewater treatment processes, implementation of WBE surveillance, and public health awareness","Technologies":"Wastewater treatment technology, WBE surveillance systems, community education","People":"Wastewater treatment operators, public health experts, general population","Owner":"Wastewater treatment facilities, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Wastewater-based epidemiology as a recognized public health surveillance tool","Impact":"Enhanced ability to measure viral circulation and monitor disease spread in the population","Mitigation":"Investment in research and development of WBE technologies and integration into public health systems","Technologies":"WBE techniques, data analysis tools, public health infrastructure","People":"Public health officials, researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Government institutions, research organizations"}]}
